Determine contribution treatment control pain patient . III . Determine toxicity regimen patient . IV . Determine objective response biological observation patient treatment . V. Determine effect regimen survival patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive methylprednisolone IV weekly 3 month . Arm II : Patients receive methylprednisolone IV doxorubicin IV weekly 3 month . Quality life assess treatment , every 4 week treatment , every 3 month . Patients follow every 3 month .
